title: Contemporary Bandung Stay Close to All the Sights
description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Bandung Pasteur, an IHG Hotel, a contemporary hotel with unparalleled connectivity. Located in the cafe-filled Pasteur neighbourhood and with a state-of-the-art business centre, fitness centre, pool and meeting facilities, this hotel is perfect for business travellers and cultural adventurers alike. Enjoy a meal at The Ambassador Restaurant or Magenta Coffee & Wine before venturing out to enjoy the Sundanese culture, colonial architecture and cool green parks.
location_description: Holiday Inn Bandung Pasteur, an IHG Hotel

title: Modern Bandung Escape with Onsite Dining, Pool & Fitness Centre
description:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant energy of Indonesia's third-largest city with a stay at this Mecure property which exudes elegance. Located in the heart of Bandung, this contemporary hotel is just a short stroll from the city's bustling shopping district and the historic Gedung Sate. Gastronomical experiments never go wrong at the onsite Cyber Cafe where you can enjoy authentic Indonesian cuisine.

Take a refreshing dip in the sleek indoor pool, or explore the surrounding area, renowned for its cool mountain air, tea plantations, and volcanic landscapes. When the day is done, retreat to your elegantly appointed room, complete with modern amenities and stunning city views.

title: Stylish Bandung City Centre Stay with Rooftop Pool, Bar & Onsite Dining
description:
Explore the cultural and business district of Bandung while you stay at this Mercure property, perfectly positioned in this vibrant city. In an ideal spot, the hotel offers easy access to the city's most popular attractions, including the historic Gedung Merdeka and Jalan Asia Afrika, also known as a culinary tourism hotspot.

Back at the hotel relish authentic flavours of the country at Pandawa, the all-day dining restaurant, or sip on a refreshing drink at the bar while admiring panoramic city views. For fitness enthusiasts, the hotel boasts a modern gym and a stunning rooftop pool to keep their workout regime going while enjoying a holiday in Bandung. The perfect stop for business and leisure travellers.
offer_address: Jalan Lengkong Besar No 8, Cikawao, Lengkong, Bandung, Jawa Barat, 40261, Indonesia

title: Central Bandung Escape with Onsite Restaurant, Outdoor Pool & Spa
description:
Check in to your city centre sanctuary with a stay at elegant Novotel Bandung. Perfectly positioned in the city’s central business district, Novotel Bandung offers a quiet space for focus and refreshment between trips to explore the colonial architecture and cultural hotspots of this West Java city.

In close proximity to the popular eateries of Jalan Braga, you’ll nonetheless be well-served with the Novotel’s onsite restaurant, The Square, plating up flavourful Indonesian and Asian dishes. With a dip in the stylish outdoor pool, or a well-deserved treatment at the onsite spa (additional costs apply) you’re all set to take on the day and uncover Bandung’s best sights.
offer_address: Jalan Cihampelas No.23-25, West Java, Bandung 40171, Indonesia

title: Stylish Pullman Bandung Stay with Panoramic City Views, Three Onsite Restaurants & Rooftop Pool
description:
Experience the height of luxury and sophistication at this 5-star Pullman property located in the heart of Bandung. With sweeping city views and close proximity to iconic landmarks like Gedung Sate and the Geology Museum, this is the ideal retreat for business, leisure or a memorable staycation. This hotel combines modern elegance with a nod to Bandung’s Dutch colonial heritage, reflected in its bold yet classic design.

Enjoy exquisitely designed rooms, complete with cutting-edge technology for seamless relaxation. Sip on exotic cocktails at AKASA 360° Views Rooftop Bar and indulge in the New York-style grill, Mad Cow Wine & Grill. The hotel boasts expansive event spaces, including a kids’ club for family convenience. For relaxation, retreat to the hotel's serene wellness centre or take a dip in the stunning rooftop pool.
offer_address: Jl Diponegoro No 27 Citarum Bandung Wetan, Bandung 40115, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Bandung Hideaway with Sky-High Bar & Restaurant
description: Experience the relentless buzz of Bandung from your hideaway at Crowne Plaza Bandung, an IHG Hotel, a five-star slice of serenity amid the hustle and bustle. Dine at the Mountain View Poolside Bar & Restaurant on the hotel's fifth floor, with international and Indonesian dishes served with the glorious Bandung skyline as the backdrop. When you're not indulging in gourmet delights, take a dip in the swimming pool or treat yourself to a massage at the spa.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Bandung, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Jalan Lembong No.19, Jawa Barat, Bandung 40111, Indonesia

title: Modern West Java Escape with Two Restaurants, Outdoor Pool & Spa
description:
Nestled in one of Bandung's coolest neighborhoods, this stylish hotel is your home base where comfort meets cool. Trendy rooms, panoramic views and a relaxed yet sophisticated atmosphere await your arrival, along with bright and modern public spaces and world-class service, making for the perfect urban escape.

Taste your way through Asia at Jing Paradise Restaurant, savour international fare at Hardy's and treat yourself to unparalleled views and poolside cocktails at Kepler Skylounge & Bar. For ultimate relaxation, head to the onsite spa, or keep up with your fitness routine at the gym before retreating to your private room or suite.
offer_address: Jl Dr Setiabudi No 269 275, Bandung, Jawa Barat 40154, Indonesia
